reviewText: It's a VERY basic workout, and basically you either hold your child or they sit on top of your stomach or back for all the various exercises.  My 2.5 year old is 26 lbs, and I'm not really sure if the exercises where they are sitting on your back are especially healthy for your back.  Additionally, unless your toddler is hella coordinated (which I don't know any that are) they are going to fall off your back, which is not really conducive to a good workout.  If you're looking for a light fluffy workout to do that you have to carry your kid around during, this is the video for you.  If you're looking for a workout with moves that both you and your child can do together this is not the one.
